text: Ellis Rastelli (born 18 January 1975) is an Italian former professional racing cyclist. He rode in four editions of the Giro d'Italia. ==Major results== ;1998 :1st Stage 5 Regio-Tour ;1999 :1st Stage 2 Euskal Bizikleta :7th Overall GP Kranj ;2001 :1st Stage 1 Giro d'Italia :3rd Giro del Friuli ;2004 :8th Overall Post Danmark Rundt ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male cyclists Category:Giro d'Italia cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Emilia-Romagna
title: Ellis Rastelli
